sentences.en: Certain modes of vibration may be suppressed while others may be enhanced.
sentences.cn: 某些振型可能减弱,而另一些则可能加强.

sentences.en: Damping wakes possible finite steady - state vibration amplitude at resonance.
sentences.cn: 在共振时,阻尼可能限制稳定振动的振幅.

sentences.en: He felt the vibration of footsteps.
I am sure I can feel a vibration through the soles of my feet.
sentences.cn: 我敢肯定我能感到脚底下有震动。

sentences.en: It was a vibration merely, faint, elusive, impossible of definition.
sentences.cn: 这不过是一声震颤, 隐隐约约, 难以捉摸, 无法形容.

sentences.en: It'should be noted that the vibration is not wig - wag.
sentences.cn: 要注意,这里讲的振动不是摇摆.

sentences.en: Suitable noise and vibration isolation, and protection against freezing must be provided.
sentences.cn: 必须提供适当的消声和隔振以及防冻措施.

sentences.en: The amplitude of the vibration determines the loudness of the sound.
sentences.cn: 振动幅度的大小决定声音的大小.

sentences.en: The blade is clamped and excited into some mode of vibration.
sentences.cn: 叶片夹好后,被激发进入某种振动状态.

sentences.en: The eccentric mass type vibration generators are bolted to the platform.
sentences.cn: 偏心量型式的振动发生器锚固在台身上.

sentences.en: The microscope must be free from vibration.
sentences.cn: 显微镜一定要避免震动。

sentences.en: The vibration of the window woke me up.
sentences.cn: 窗子的震动把我惊醒了.

sentences.en: Their instruments can detect the slightest vibration.
sentences.cn: 他们的仪器能探测出极微弱的震动.

sentences.en: There is so much vibration on a ship that one cannot write.
sentences.cn: 船上的震动大得使人无法书写.

sentences.en: Vibration displaced part of the mechanism.
sentences.cn: 部分机械装置因受震动而移位了.

sentences.en: Your finger can feel the vibration on the violin string.
sentences.cn: 你的手指能感觉小提琴琴弦的颤动.

words.tran_cn: 振动的；充满生气的；响亮的；战栗的
[力] 振动的，震动性的；摇摆的
振动器；[电子] 振子；振动按摩器；振动滚筒；簧片

phrases.tran_cn: 减震器；阻尼器；防震材料
振动钻井；振动钻眼；振动凿岩
频率；振动频率；波动频率

trans.tran_cn: 摆动，震动，感受，（偏离平衡位置的）一次性往复振动
